Title: Down House
Writer: Fyodor Dostoevsky (novel), Roman Kachanov, Ivan Okhlobystin
Actors: Fedor Bondarchuk, Ivan Okhlobystin, Anna Buklovskaya, Aleksandr Bashirov
Plot: The plot is set in modern Moscow, in the 1990s, with "New Russians", Hummer H1 jeeps, bribery, violence, truck fulls of tinned stew as a dowry, etc.
